message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $15,000.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $15,000 represents the value of this product, I understand you have a budget. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
